!!Example 6
*Held to maturity的carrying value以amortised cost计量，即Historical cost + Interest ocurred - Coupon Payment
* 交易对价的三个部分：book/carrying value of net assets + FV appreciation +Goodwill
* Investment科目余额=期初值+adjusted NI*%-Dividend*%
*Adjusted net income如果有fair value appreciation，说明当期折旧低估了，需要将低估的折旧金额从net income递减:(Amortisation of excess price over PP&E's book value)
* Goodwill impairment loss 
**IFRS：goodwill impairment loss=①carrying value of cash-generating units-②recoverable amount of cash-generating units；①大于②，即减值发生
**GAAP：两步法。
***第一步比较reporting unit的fair value即carrying value;
***如fair value更小，进入第二步减值计算；Impairment loss=Goodwill - implied goodwill。
***Implied goodwill 即以当前市场价格再次收购标的资产计算出的implied goodwil =reporting unit's fair value - identifiable net asset.
